GE07mbh_16_u:1: 16,000.000*0001_02 devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_16_u:3: 16,001.001a ṣaṭtriṃśe tv atha saṃprāpte varṣe kauravanandanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:13: 16,001.006a ete cānye ca bahava utpātā bhayaśaṃsinaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:15: 16,001.006d*0002_01 dṛśyante jagato nāthe divam āroḍhum icchati
GE07mbh_16_u:16: 16,001.006d*0003_01 yasya prasādād dharmo 'yaṃ kṛte yadvat kalāv api
GE07mbh_16_u:17: 16,001.006d*0003_02 pāṇḍavās tu mahābhāgā yuktās tu yaśasānaghāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:18: 16,001.007a kasya cit tv atha kālasya kururājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:20: 16,001.008a vimuktaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca śrutvā rāmaṃ ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:21: 16,001.008c samānīyābravīd bhrātṝn kiṃ kariṣyāma ity uta
GE07mbh_16_u:23: 16,001.009c vṛṣṇīn vinaṣṭāṃs te śrutvā vyathitāḥ pāṇḍavābhavan
GE07mbh_16_u:25: 16,001.010c vīrā na śraddadhus tasya vināśaṃ śārṅgadhanvanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:29: 16,002.001a kathaṃ vinaṣṭā bhagavann andhakā vṛṣṇibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_16_u:33: 16,002.002a ṣaṭtriṃśe 'tha tato varṣe vṛṣṇīnām anayo mahān
GE07mbh_16_u:34: 16,002.002c anyonyaṃ musalais te tu nijaghnuḥ kālacoditāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:36: 16,002.003a kenānuśaptās te vīrāḥ kṣayaṃ vṛṣṇyandhakā yayuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:37: 16,002.003c bhojāś ca dvijavarya tvaṃ vistareṇa vadasva me
GE07mbh_16_u:39: 16,002.004a viśvāmitraṃ ca kaṇvaṃ ca nāradaṃ ca tapodhanam
GE07mbh_16_u:41: 16,002.005a te vai sāmbaṃ puraskṛtya bhūṣayitvā striyaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_16_u:44: 16,002.006c ṛṣayaḥ sādhu jānīta kim iyaṃ janayiṣyati
GE07mbh_16_u:45: 16,002.007a ity uktās te tadā rājan vipralambhapradharṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:46: 16,002.007c pratyabruvaṃs tān munayo yat tac chṛṇu narādhipa
GE07mbh_16_u:51: 16,002.010a samudraṃ yāsyati śrīmāṃs tyaktvā dehaṃ halāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:52: 16,002.010c jarā kṛṣṇaṃ mahātmānaṃ śayānaṃ bhuvi bhetsyati
GE07mbh_16_u:53: 16,002.011a ity abruvanta te rājan pralabdhās tair durātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:55: 16,002.012a tathoktvā munayas te tu tataḥ keśavam abhyayuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:57: 16,002.013c antajño matimāṃs tasya bhavitavyaṃ tatheti tān
GE07mbh_16_u:58: 16,002.014a evam uktvā hṛṣīkeśaḥ praviveśa punar gṛhān
GE07mbh_16_u:59: 16,002.014c kṛtāntam anyathā naicchat kartuṃ sa jagataḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:60: 16,002.015a śvobhūte 'tha tataḥ sāmbo musalaṃ tad asūta vai
GE07mbh_16_u:63: 16,002.016a prasūtaṃ śāpajaṃ ghoraṃ tac ca rājñe nyavedayan
GE07mbh_16_u:64: 16,002.016c viṣaṇṇarūpas tad rājā sūkṣmaṃ cūrṇam akārayat
GE07mbh_16_u:65: 16,002.017a prākṣipan sāgare tac ca puruṣā rājaśāsanāt
GE07mbh_16_u:66: 16,002.017b*0006_01 tac cūrṇaṃ sāgare cāpi prākṣipan puruṣā nṛpa
GE07mbh_16_u:67: 16,002.017b*0007_01 jajñe sāve[va?]rakāś cūrṇaṃ prakḷptaṃ tair mahodadhau
GE07mbh_16_u:68: 16,002.017c aghoṣayaṃś ca nagare vacanād āhukasya ca
GE07mbh_16_u:72: 16,002.019a yaś ca no 'viditaṃ kuryāt peyaṃ kaś cin naraḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_16_u:73: 16,002.019c jīvan sa śūlam ārohet svayaṃ kṛtvā sabāndhavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:74: 16,002.020a tato rājabhayāt sarve niyamaṃ cakrire tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:75: 16,002.020c narāḥ śāsanam ājñāya tasya rājño mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:83: 16,003.002c gṛhāṇy avekṣya vṛṣṇīnāṃ nādṛśyata punaḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_16_u:85: 16,003.002d*0011_02 na cāśakyata veddhuṃ sa sarvabhūtātyayas tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:86: 16,003.003a utpedire mahāvātā dāruṇāś cā dine dine
GE07mbh_16_u:89: 16,003.004b*0012_01 keśā nakhāś ca suptānām adyante mūṣakair niśi
GE07mbh_16_u:91: 16,003.004e nopaśāmyati śabdaś ca sa divārātram eva hi
GE07mbh_16_u:93: 16,003.005c ajāḥ śivānāṃ ca rutam anvakurvata bhārata
GE07mbh_16_u:97: 16,003.007c śunīṣv api biḍālāś ca mūṣakā nakulīṣu ca
GE07mbh_16_u:99: 16,003.008c prādviṣan brāhmaṇāṃś cāpi pitṝn devāṃs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_16_u:100: 16,003.009a gurūṃś cāpy avamanyanta na tu rāmajanārdanau
GE07mbh_16_u:101: 16,003.009c patnyaḥ patīn vyuccaranta patnīś ca patayas tathā
GE07mbh_16_u:108: 16,003.013a puṇyāhe vācyamāne ca japatsu ca mahātmasu
GE07mbh_16_u:110: 16,003.013c abhidhāvantaḥ śrūyante na cādṛśyata kaś cana
GE07mbh_16_u:111: 16,003.014a parasparaṃ ca nakṣatraṃ hanyamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:112: 16,003.014c grahair apaśyan sarve te nātmanas tu kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_16_u:116: 16,003.016c trayodaśyām amāvāsyāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā prābravīd idam
GE07mbh_16_u:118: 16,003.017c tadā ca bhārate yuddhe prāptā cādya kṣayāya naḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:119: 16,003.018a vimṛśann eva kālaṃ taṃ paricintya janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:120: 16,003.018c mene prāptaṃ sa ṣaṭtriṃśaṃ varṣaṃ vai keśisūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:123: 16,003.020a idaṃ ca tad anuprāptam abravīd yad yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:126: 16,003.020d*0014_02 puṇyakarmaprayogāc ca nānyac chreyo bhaved iti
GE07mbh_16_u:127: 16,003.021a ity uktvā vāsudevas tu cikīrṣan satyam eva tat
GE07mbh_16_u:132: 16,004.001a kālī strī pāṇḍurair dantaiḥ praviśya hasatī niśi
GE07mbh_16_u:136: 16,004.001d*0016_01 kurvanto bhīṣaṇān nādān karālāś cāpy asaṃgatāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:137: 16,004.001d*0016_02 tathā dviśiraso raudrāś caturbāhava eva ca
GE07mbh_16_u:138: 16,004.001d*0016_03 strīṇāṃ garbheṣu jāyante rākṣasā guhyakās tathā
GE07mbh_16_u:139: 16,004.002a alaṃkārāś ca chatraṃ ca dhvajāś ca kavacāni ca
GE07mbh_16_u:142: 16,004.003c divam ācakrame cakraṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ paśyatāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:143: 16,004.004a yuktaṃ rathaṃ divyam ādityavarṇaṃ; hayāharan paśyato dārukasya
GE07mbh_16_u:144: 16,004.004c te sāgarasyopariṣṭhād avartan; manojavāś caturo vājimukhyāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:145: 16,004.005a tālaḥ suparṇaś ca mahādhvajau tau; supūjitau rāmajanārdanābhyām
GE07mbh_16_u:146: 16,004.005c uccair jahrur apsaraso divāniśaṃ; vācaś cocur gamyatāṃ tīrthayātrā
GE07mbh_16_u:148: 16,004.005d*0017_02 divaḥ praveśanārthaṃ te vimānair divam āyayuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:151: 16,004.007a tato bhojyaṃ ca bhakṣyaṃ ca peyaṃ cāndhakavṛṣṇayaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:152: 16,004.007c bahu nānāvidhaṃ cakrur madyaṃ māṃsam anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:153: 16,004.008a tataḥ sīdhuṣu saktāś ca niryayur nagarād bahiḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:154: 16,004.008c yānair aśvair gajaiś caiva śrīmantas tigmatejasaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:157: 16,004.010a niviṣṭāṃs tān niśamyātha samudrānte sa yogavit
GE07mbh_16_u:160: 16,004.011c jānan vināśaṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ naicchad vārayituṃ hariḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:163: 16,004.013a brāhmaṇārtheṣu yat siddham annaṃ teṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_16_u:168: 16,004.015c apibad yuyudhānaś ca gado babhrus tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_16_u:171: 16,004.017a kaḥ kṣatriyo manyamānaḥ suptān hanyān mṛtān iva
GE07mbh_16_u:172: 16,004.017c na tan mṛṣyanti hārdikya yādavā yat tvayā kṛtam
GE07mbh_16_u:173: 16,004.017d*0018_01 na tan mṛṣyati hārdikyo yad avocat tadā ruṣā
GE07mbh_16_u:174: 16,004.018a ity ukte yuyudhānena pūjayām āsa tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:175: 16,004.018c pradyumno rathināṃ śreṣṭho hārdikyam avamanya ca
GE07mbh_16_u:177: 16,004.019c nirdiśann iva sāvajñaṃ tadā savyena pāṇinā
GE07mbh_16_u:180: 16,004.021a iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā keśavaḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_16_u:181: 16,004.021c tiryak saroṣayā dṛṣṭyā vīkṣāṃ cakre sa manyumān
GE07mbh_16_u:182: 16,004.022a maṇiḥ syamantakaś caiva yaḥ sa satrājito 'bhavat
GE07mbh_16_u:183: 16,004.022c tāṃ kathāṃ smārayām āsa sātyakir madhusūdanam
GE07mbh_16_u:184: 16,004.023a tac chrutvā keśavasyāṅkam agamad rudatī tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:186: 16,004.024a tata utthāya sakrodhaḥ sātyakir vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_16_u:188: 16,004.025a eṣa gacchāmi padavīṃ satyena ca tathā śape
GE07mbh_16_u:189: 16,004.025c sauptike ye ca nihatāḥ suptānena durātmanā
GE07mbh_16_u:191: 16,004.026c samāptam āyur asyādya yaśaś cāpi sumadhyame
GE07mbh_16_u:198: 16,004.030a tān dṛṣṭvā patatas tūrṇam abhikruddhāñ janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:199: 16,004.030c na cukrodha mahātejā jānan kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_16_u:200: 16,004.031a te tu pānamadāviṣṭāś coditāś caiva manyunā
GE07mbh_16_u:204: 16,004.033a sa bhojaiḥ saha saṃyuktaḥ sātyakiś cāndhakaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_16_u:206: 16,004.033c bahutvān nihatau tatra ubhau kṛṣṇasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:207: 16,004.034a hataṃ dṛṣṭvā tu śaineyaṃ putraṃ ca yadunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:208: 16,004.034c erakāṇāṃ tadā muṣṭiṃ kopāj jagrāha keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:209: 16,004.035a tad abhūn musalaṃ ghoraṃ vajrakalpam ayomayam
GE07mbh_16_u:210: 16,004.035c jaghāna tena kṛṣṇas tān ye 'sya pramukhato 'bhavan
GE07mbh_16_u:211: 16,004.036a tato 'ndhakāś ca bhojāś ca śaineyā vṛṣṇayas tathā
GE07mbh_16_u:213: 16,004.037a yas teṣām erakāṃ kaś cij jagrāha ruṣito nṛpa
GE07mbh_16_u:214: 16,004.037c vajrabhūteva sā rājann adṛśyata tadā vibho
GE07mbh_16_u:215: 16,004.038a tṛṇaṃ ca musalībhūtam api tatra vyadṛśyata
GE07mbh_16_u:216: 16,004.038c brahmadaṇḍakṛtaṃ sarvam iti tad viddhi pārthiva
GE07mbh_16_u:217: 16,004.039a āvidhyāvidhya te rājan prakṣipanti sma yat tṛṇam
GE07mbh_16_u:218: 16,004.039c tad vajrabhūtaṃ musalaṃ vyadṛśyata tadā dṛḍham
GE07mbh_16_u:219: 16,004.040a avadhīt pitaraṃ putraḥ pitā putraṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_16_u:221: 16,004.041a pataṃgā iva cāgnau te nyapatan kukurāndhakāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:222: 16,004.041c nāsīt palāyane buddhir vadhyamānasya kasya cit
GE07mbh_16_u:223: 16,004.042a taṃ tu paśyan mahābāhur jānan kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_16_u:225: 16,004.043a sāmbaṃ ca nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā cārudeṣṇaṃ ca mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:226: 16,004.043c pradyumnaṃ cāniruddhaṃ ca tataś cukrodha bhārata
GE07mbh_16_u:227: 16,004.044a gadaṃ vīkṣya śayānaṃ ca bhṛśaṃ kopasamanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:230: 16,004.045c dārukaś caiva dāśārham ūcatur yan nibodha tat
GE07mbh_16_u:231: 16,004.046a bhagavan saṃhṛtaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā bhūyiṣṭham acyuta
GE07mbh_16_u:232: 16,004.046c rāmasya padam anviccha tatra gacchāma yatra saḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:234: 16,005.001a tato yayur dārukaḥ keśavaś ca; babhruś ca rāmasya padaṃ patantaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:235: 16,005.001c athāpaśyan rāmam anantavīryaṃ; vṛkṣe sthitaṃ cintayānaṃ vivikte
GE07mbh_16_u:236: 16,005.002a tataḥ samāsādya mahānubhāvaḥ; kṛṣṇas tadā dārukam anvaśāsat
GE07mbh_16_u:237: 16,005.002c gatvā kurūñ śīghram imaṃ mahāntaṃ; pārthāya śaṃsasva vadhaṃ yadūnām
GE07mbh_16_u:238: 16,005.003a tato 'rjunaḥ kṣipram ihopayātu; śrutvā mṛtān yādavān brahmaśāpāt
GE07mbh_16_u:239: 16,005.003c ity evam uktaḥ sa yayau rathena; kurūṃs tadā dāruko naṣṭacetāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:240: 16,005.004a tato gate dāruke keśavo 'tha; dṛṣṭvāntike babhrum uvāca vākyam
GE07mbh_16_u:241: 16,005.004c striyo bhavān rakṣatu yātu śīghraṃ; naitā hiṃsyur dasyavo vittalobhāt
GE07mbh_16_u:242: 16,005.005a sa prasthitaḥ keśavenānuśiṣṭo; madāturo jñātivadhārditaś ca
GE07mbh_16_u:243: 16,005.005c taṃ vai yāntaṃ saṃnidhau keśavasya; tvarantam ekaṃ sahasaiva babhrum
GE07mbh_16_u:244: 16,005.005e brahmānuśaptam avadhīn mahad vai; kūṭonmuktaṃ musalaṃ lubdhakasya
GE07mbh_16_u:245: 16,005.006a tato dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ babhrum āha; kṛṣṇo vākyaṃ bhrātaram agrajaṃ tu
GE07mbh_16_u:246: 16,005.006c ihaiva tvaṃ māṃ pratīkṣasva rāma; yāvat striyo jñātivaśāḥ karomi
GE07mbh_16_u:247: 16,005.007a tataḥ purīṃ dvāravatīṃ praviśya; janārdanaḥ pitaraṃ prāha vākyam
GE07mbh_16_u:248: 16,005.007c striyo bhavān rakṣatu naḥ samagrā; dhanaṃjayasyāgamanaṃ pratīkṣan
GE07mbh_16_u:249: 16,005.007e rāmo vanānte pratipālayan mām; āste 'dyāhaṃ tena samāgamiṣye
GE07mbh_16_u:250: 16,005.008a dṛṣṭaṃ mayedaṃ nidhanaṃ yadūnāṃ; rājñāṃ ca pūrvaṃ kurupuṃgavānām
GE07mbh_16_u:251: 16,005.008c nāhaṃ vinā yadubhir yādavānāṃ; purīm imāṃ draṣṭum ihādya śaktaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:252: 16,005.009a tapaś cariṣyāmi nibodha tan me; rāmeṇa sārdhaṃ vanam abhyupetya
GE07mbh_16_u:253: 16,005.009c itīdam uktvā śirasāsya pādau; saṃspṛśya kṛṣṇas tvarito jagāma
GE07mbh_16_u:254: 16,005.010a tato mahān ninadaḥ prādurāsīt; sastrīkumārasya purasya tasya
GE07mbh_16_u:255: 16,005.010c athābravīt keśavaḥ saṃnivartya; śabdaṃ śrutvā yoṣitāṃ krośatīnām
GE07mbh_16_u:256: 16,005.011a purīm imām eṣyati savyasācī; sa vo duḥkhān mocayitā narāgryaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:257: 16,005.011c tato gatvā keśavas taṃ dadarśa; rāmaṃ vane sthitam ekaṃ vivikte
GE07mbh_16_u:258: 16,005.012a athāpaśyad yogayuktasya tasya; nāgaṃ mukhān niḥsarantaṃ mahāntam
GE07mbh_16_u:259: 16,005.012c śvetaṃ yayau sa tataḥ prekṣyamāṇo; mahārṇavo yena mahānubhāvaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:262: 16,005.013a sahasraśīrṣaḥ parvatābhogavarṣmā; raktānanaḥ svāṃ tanuṃ tāṃ vimucya
GE07mbh_16_u:264: 16,005.013c samyak ca taṃ sāgaraḥ pratyagṛhṇān; nāgā divyāḥ saritaś caiva puṇyāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:265: 16,005.014a karkoṭako vāsukis takṣakaś ca; pṛthuśravā varuṇaḥ kuñjaraś ca
GE07mbh_16_u:266: 16,005.014c miśrī śaṅkhaḥ kumudaḥ puṇḍarīkas; tathā nāgo dhṛtarāṣṭro mahātmā
GE07mbh_16_u:267: 16,005.015a hrādaḥ krāthaḥ śitikaṇṭho 'gratejās; tathā nāgau cakramandātiṣaṇḍau
GE07mbh_16_u:268: 16,005.015c nāgaśreṣṭho durmukhaś cāmbarīṣaḥ; svayaṃ rājā varuṇaś cāpi rājan
GE07mbh_16_u:273: 16,005.016a tato gate bhrātari vāsudevo; jānan sarvā gatayo divyadṛṣṭiḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:274: 16,005.016c vane śūnye vicaraṃś cintayāno; bhūmau tataḥ saṃviveśāgryatejāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:275: 16,005.017a sarvaṃ hi tena prāk tadā vittam āsīd; gāndhāryā yad vākyam uktaḥ sa pūrvam
GE07mbh_16_u:276: 16,005.017c durvāsasā pāyasocchiṣṭalipte; yac cāpy uktaṃ tac ca sasmāra kṛṣṇaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:282: 16,005.018c mene tataḥ saṃkramaṇasya kālaṃ; tataś cakārendriyasaṃnirodham
GE07mbh_16_u:287: 16,005.019a sa saṃniruddhendriyavāṅmanās tu; śiśye mahāyogam upetya kṛṣṇaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:288: 16,005.019c jarātha taṃ deśam upājagāma; lubdhas tadānīṃ mṛgalipsur ugraḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:289: 16,005.020a sa keśavaṃ yogayuktaṃ śayānaṃ; mṛgāśaṅkī lubdhakaḥ sāyakena
GE07mbh_16_u:290: 16,005.020c jarāvidhyat pādatale tvarāvāṃs; taṃ cābhitas taj jighṛkṣur jagāma
GE07mbh_16_u:294: 16,005.021a matvātmānam aparāddhaṃ sa tasya; jagrāha pādau śirasā cārtarūpaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:295: 16,005.021c āśvāsayat taṃ mahātmā tadānīṃ; gacchann ūrdhvaṃ rodasī vyāpya lakṣmyā
GE07mbh_16_u:303: 16,005.022a divaṃ prāptaṃ vāsavo 'thāśvinau ca; rudrādityā vasavaś cātha viśve
GE07mbh_16_u:304: 16,005.022c pratyudyayur munayaś cāpi siddhā; gandharvamukhyāś ca sahāpsarobhiḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:307: 16,005.023a tato rājan bhagavān ugratejā; nārāyaṇaḥ prabhavaś cāvyayaś ca
GE07mbh_16_u:308: 16,005.023c yogācāryo rodasī vyāpya lakṣmyā; sthānaṃ prāpa svaṃ mahātmāprameyam
GE07mbh_16_u:309: 16,005.024a tato devair ṛṣibhiś cāpi kṛṣṇaḥ; samāgataś cāraṇaiś caiva rājan
GE07mbh_16_u:312: 16,005.024c gandharvāgryair apsarobhir varābhiḥ; siddhaiḥ sādhyaiś cānataiḥ pūjyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:313: 16,005.025a te vai devāḥ pratyanandanta rājan; muniśreṣṭhā vāgbhir ānarcur īśam
GE07mbh_16_u:316: 16,005.025c gandharvāś cāpy upatasthuḥ stuvantaḥ; prītyā cainaṃ puruhūto 'bhyanandat
GE07mbh_16_u:327: 16,005.025d@001_0011 vāṇī hy āsīt saṃśritā rūpiṇī sā
GE07mbh_16_u:328: 16,005.025d@001_0012 bhānor madhye praviśa tvaṃ tu rājan
GE07mbh_16_u:338: 16,006.001a dāruko 'pi kurūn gatvā dṛṣṭvā pārthān mahārathān
GE07mbh_16_u:342: 16,006.003a tato 'rjunas tān āmantrya keśavasya priyaḥ sakhā
GE07mbh_16_u:343: 16,006.003c prayayau mātulaṃ draṣṭuṃ nedam astīti cābravīt
GE07mbh_16_u:344: 16,006.004a sa vṛṣṇinilayaṃ gatvā dārukeṇa saha prabho
GE07mbh_16_u:345: 16,006.004c dadarśa dvārakāṃ vīro mṛtanāthām iva striyam
GE07mbh_16_u:346: 16,006.005a yāḥ sma tā lokanāthena nāthavatyaḥ purābhavan
GE07mbh_16_u:347: 16,006.005c tās tv anāthās tadā nāthaṃ pārthaṃ dṛṣṭvā vicukruśuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:348: 16,006.005d*0034_01 arjunaṃ tāḥ sma nāthaṃ ca dṛṣṭvānāthaṃ vicukruśuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:350: 16,006.006c tāsām āsīn mahān nādo dṛṣṭvaivārjunam āgatam
GE07mbh_16_u:351: 16,006.007a tās tu dṛṣṭvaiva kauravyo bāṣpeṇa pihito 'rjunaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:352: 16,006.007c hīnāḥ kṛṣṇena putraiś ca nāśakat so 'bhivīkṣitum
GE07mbh_16_u:361: 16,006.012a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā dvārakāṃ pārthas tāś ca kṛṣṇasya yoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:363: 16,006.013a sātrājitī tataḥ satyā rukmiṇī ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_16_u:365: 16,006.014a tatas tāḥ kāñcane pīṭhe samutthāyopaveśya ca
GE07mbh_16_u:367: 16,006.015a tataḥ saṃstūya govindaṃ kathayitvā ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:368: 16,006.015c āśvāsya tāḥ striyaś cāpi mātulaṃ draṣṭum abhyagāt
GE07mbh_16_u:375: 16,007.002d*0035_02 svasrīyasya mahābāhur na śaśāka ca śatruhan
GE07mbh_16_u:377: 16,007.003c rudan putrān smaran sarvān vilalāpa suvihvalaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:378: 16,007.003e bhrātṝn putrāṃś ca pautrāṃś ca dauhitrāṃś ca sakhīn api
GE07mbh_16_u:380: 16,007.004a yair jitā bhūmipālāś ca daityāś ca śataśo 'rjuna
GE07mbh_16_u:381: 16,007.004c tān dṛṣṭvā neha paśyāmi jīvāmy arjuna durmaraḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:382: 16,007.005a yau tāv arjuna śiṣyau te priyau bahumatau sadā
GE07mbh_16_u:383: 16,007.005c tayor apanayāt pārtha vṛṣṇayo nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:384: 16,007.006a yau tau vṛṣṇipravīrāṇāṃ dvāv evātirathau matau
GE07mbh_16_u:385: 16,007.006c pradyumno yuyudhānaś ca kathayan katthase ca yau
GE07mbh_16_u:386: 16,007.007a nityaṃ tvaṃ kuruśārdūla kṛṣṇaś ca mama putrakaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:387: 16,007.007c tāv ubhau vṛṣṇināśasya mukham āstāṃ dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_16_u:388: 16,007.008a na tu garhāmi śaineyaṃ hārdikyaṃ cāham arjuna
GE07mbh_16_u:389: 16,007.008c akrūraṃ raukmiṇeyaṃ ca śāpo hy evātra kāraṇam
GE07mbh_16_u:390: 16,007.009a keśinaṃ yas tu kaṃsaṃ ca vikramya jagataḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:391: 16,007.009c videhāv akarot pārtha caidyaṃ ca balagarvitam
GE07mbh_16_u:393: 16,007.010c gāndhārān kāśirājaṃ ca marubhūmau ca pārthivān
GE07mbh_16_u:394: 16,007.011a prācyāṃś ca dākṣiṇātyāṃś ca pārvatīyāṃs tathā nṛpān
GE07mbh_16_u:396: 16,007.011d*0036_01 tvaṃ hi taṃ nāradaś caiva munayaś ca sanātanam
GE07mbh_16_u:398: 16,007.011d*0036_03 pratyapaśyac ca sa vibhur jñātikṣayam adhokṣajaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:399: 16,007.011d*0036_04 upaprekṣitavān nityaṃ svayaṃ sa mama putrakaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:400: 16,007.011d*0036_05 gāndhāryā vacanaṃ yat tad ṛṣīṇāṃ ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_16_u:401: 16,007.011d*0036_06 tan nūnam anyathā kartuṃ naicchat sa jagataḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:402: 16,007.011d*0036_07 pratyakṣaṃ bhavataś cāpi tava pautraḥ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_16_u:403: 16,007.011d*0036_08 aśvatthāmnā hataś cāpi jīvitas tasya tejasā
GE07mbh_16_u:404: 16,007.011d*0036_09 imāṃs tu naicchat svāñ jñātīn rakṣituṃ sa sakhā tava
GE07mbh_16_u:405: 16,007.012a tataḥ putrāṃś ca pautrāṃś ca bhrātṝn atha sakhīn api
GE07mbh_16_u:406: 16,007.012c śayānān nihatān dṛṣṭvā tato mām abravīd idam
GE07mbh_16_u:409: 16,007.014a ākhyeyaṃ tasya yad vṛttaṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ vaiśasaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_16_u:410: 16,007.014c sa tu śrutvā mahātejā yadūnām anayaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_16_u:411: 16,007.014e āgantā kṣipram eveha na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_16_u:412: 16,007.015a yo 'haṃ tam arjunaṃ viddhi yo 'rjunaḥ so 'ham eva tu
GE07mbh_16_u:413: 16,007.015b*0037_01 yathā jīvaṃ paraṃ brahma mahāvākyasya niścayāt
GE07mbh_16_u:414: 16,007.015c yad brūyāt tat tathā kāryam iti budhyasva mādhava
GE07mbh_16_u:415: 16,007.016a sa strīṣu prāptakālaṃ vaḥ pāṇḍavo bālakeṣu ca
GE07mbh_16_u:417: 16,007.017a imāṃ ca nagarīṃ sadyaḥ pratiyāte dhanaṃjaye
GE07mbh_16_u:419: 16,007.018a ahaṃ hi deśe kasmiṃś cit puṇye niyamam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:420: 16,007.018c kālaṃ kartā sadya eva rāmeṇa saha dhīmatā
GE07mbh_16_u:422: 16,007.019c hitvā māṃ bālakaiḥ sārdhaṃ diśaṃ kām apy agāt prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:423: 16,007.020a so 'haṃ tau ca mahātmānau cintayan bhrātarau tava
GE07mbh_16_u:424: 16,007.020c ghoraṃ jñātivadhaṃ caiva na bhuñje śokakarśitaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:425: 16,007.021a na ca bhokṣye na jīviṣye diṣṭyā prāpto 'si pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_16_u:426: 16,007.021c yad uktaṃ pārtha kṛṣṇena tat sarvam akhilaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_16_u:427: 16,007.022a etat te pārtha rājyaṃ ca striyo ratnāni caiva ha
GE07mbh_16_u:429: 16,007.022b*0038_02 tair hīnāṃ pṛthivīṃ draṣṭuṃ na ca śakṣyāmi phalguna
GE07mbh_16_u:430: 16,007.022c iṣṭān prāṇān ahaṃ hīmāṃs tyakṣyāmi ripusūdana
GE07mbh_16_u:432: 16,008.001a evam uktaḥ sa bībhatsur mātulena paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:435: 16,008.002c vihīnāṃ pṛthivīṃ draṣṭuṃ śaktaś ciram iha prabho
GE07mbh_16_u:436: 16,008.003a rājā ca bhīmasenaś ca sahadevaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:437: 16,008.003c nakulo yājñasenī ca ṣaḍ ekamanaso vayam
GE07mbh_16_u:438: 16,008.004a rājñaḥ saṃkramaṇe cāpi kālo 'yaṃ vartate dhruvam
GE07mbh_16_u:439: 16,008.004c tam imaṃ viddhi saṃprāptaṃ kālaṃ kālavidāṃ vara
GE07mbh_16_u:440: 16,008.005a sarvathā vṛṣṇidārāṃs tu bālavṛddhāṃs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_16_u:442: 16,008.006a ity uktvā dārukam idaṃ vākyam āha dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:444: 16,008.007a ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ sudharmāṃ yādavīṃ sabhām
GE07mbh_16_u:446: 16,008.008a tam āsanagataṃ tatra sarvāḥ prakṛtayas tathā
GE07mbh_16_u:449: 16,008.009c uvācedaṃ vacaḥ pārthaḥ svayaṃ dīnataras tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:451: 16,008.010c idaṃ tu nagaraṃ sarvaṃ samudraḥ plāvayiṣyati
GE07mbh_16_u:454: 16,008.012a saptame divase caiva ravau vimala udgate
GE07mbh_16_u:456: 16,008.013a ity uktās tena te paurāḥ pārthenākliṣṭakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_16_u:457: 16,008.013c sajjam āśu tataś cakruḥ svasiddhyarthaṃ samutsukāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:458: 16,008.014a tāṃ rātrim avasat pārthaḥ keśavasya niveśane
GE07mbh_16_u:462: 16,008.016a tataḥ śabdo mahān āsīd vasudevasya veśmani
GE07mbh_16_u:463: 16,008.016c dāruṇaḥ krośatīnāṃ ca rudatīnāṃ ca yoṣitām
GE07mbh_16_u:465: 16,008.017c urāṃsi pāṇibhir ghnantyo vyalapan karuṇaṃ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:466: 16,008.018a taṃ devakī ca bhadrā ca rohiṇī madirā tathā
GE07mbh_16_u:469: 16,008.019c yānena mahatā pārtho bahir niṣkrāmayat tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:473: 16,008.021c purastāt tasya yānasya yājakāś ca tato yayuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:474: 16,008.022a anujagmuś ca taṃ vīraṃ devyas tā vai svalaṃkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:476: 16,008.023a yas tu deśaḥ priyas tasya jīvato 'bhūn mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:480: 16,008.025a taṃ vai catasṛbhiḥ strībhir anvitaṃ pāṇḍunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:481: 16,008.025c adāhayac candanaiś ca gandhair uccāvacair api
GE07mbh_16_u:483: 16,008.026c sāmagānāṃ ca nirghoṣo narāṇāṃ rudatām api
GE07mbh_16_u:485: 16,008.027c sarva evodakaṃ cakruḥ striyaś caiva mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:486: 16,008.028a aluptadharmas taṃ dharmaṃ kārayitvā sa phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:488: 16,008.029a sa tān dṛṣṭvā nipatitān kadane bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:490: 16,008.030a yathāpradhānataś caiva cakre sarvāḥ kriyās tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:492: 16,008.030d*0039_01 tato bhagavato dehaṃ dṛṣṭvā śiṣyaḥ pralapya ca
GE07mbh_16_u:499: 16,008.032a sa teṣāṃ vidhivat kṛtvā pretakāryāṇi pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:500: 16,008.032c saptame divase prāyād ratham āruhya satvaraḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:504: 16,008.034a bhṛtyās tv andhakavṛṣṇīnāṃ sādino rathinaś ca ye
GE07mbh_16_u:507: 16,008.035a kuñjaraiś ca gajārohā yayuḥ śailanibhais tathā
GE07mbh_16_u:510: 16,008.036c brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś caiva mahādhanāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:512: 16,008.037c puraskṛtya yayur vajraṃ pautraṃ kṛṣṇasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:513: 16,008.038a bahūni ca sahasrāṇi prayutāny arbudāni ca
GE07mbh_16_u:517: 16,008.040a niryāte tu jane tasmin sāgaro makarālayaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:519: 16,008.040d*0041_01 yad yad dhi puruṣavyāghro bhūmes tasyā vyamuñcata
GE07mbh_16_u:520: 16,008.040d*0041_02 tat tat saṃplāvayām āsa salilena sa sāgaraḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:521: 16,008.040d*0042_01 abravīc ca tadā sarvān prāṇinas tatra sāgaraḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:523: 16,008.040d*0042_03 bhājanāni ca haimāni raupyāṇi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_16_u:525: 16,008.040d*0042_05 saveśmakā purī ceyaṃ hareḥ pālyā mayādhunā
GE07mbh_16_u:526: 16,008.040d*0042_06 punar yatrāvatāraś ca bhaviṣyati kṛte yuge
GE07mbh_16_u:527: 16,008.040d*0042_07 kośādhyakṣo 'smy ahaṃ tasya tasyaitāny api no dhanam
GE07mbh_16_u:529: 16,008.041c tūrṇāt tūrṇataraṃ jagmur aho daivam iti bruvan
GE07mbh_16_u:530: 16,008.042a kānaneṣu ca ramyeṣu parvateṣu nadīṣu ca
GE07mbh_16_u:541: 16,008.046c nayaty asmān atikramya yodhāś ceme hataujasaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:543: 16,008.046d*0044_02 jitvā śakraṃ ca rudraṃ ca so 'smān adyāvamanyate
GE07mbh_16_u:549: 16,008.049c uvāca tān mahābāhur arjunaḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_16_u:550: 16,008.050a nivartadhvam adharmajñā yadi stha na mumūrṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:552: 16,008.051a tathoktās tena vīreṇa kadarthīkṛtya tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:553: 16,008.051c abhipetur janaṃ mūḍhā vāryamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:554: 16,008.052a tato 'rjuno dhanur divyaṃ gāṇḍīvam ajaraṃ mahat
GE07mbh_16_u:555: 16,008.052b*0045_01 ākroṣṭuṃ nāśakaj jiṣṇuḥ sarvaprāṇaiś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_16_u:556: 16,008.052c āropayitum ārebhe yatnād iva kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_16_u:557: 16,008.053a cakāra sajyaṃ kṛcchreṇa saṃbhrame tumule sati
GE07mbh_16_u:559: 16,008.053a*0046_02 tvagbhedaṃ na śarāś cakrur astā gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
GE07mbh_16_u:560: 16,008.053c cintayām āsa cāstrāṇi na ca sasmāra tāny api
GE07mbh_16_u:561: 16,008.054a vaikṛtyaṃ tan mahad dṛṣṭvā bhujavīrye tathā yudhi
GE07mbh_16_u:564: 16,008.055c na śekur āvartayituṃ hriyamāṇaṃ ca taṃ janam
GE07mbh_16_u:565: 16,008.056a kalatrasya bahutvāt tu saṃpatatsu tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:570: 16,008.058c jaghāna dasyūn sodvego vṛṣṇibhṛtyaiḥ saha prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:571: 16,008.059a kṣaṇena tasya te rājan kṣayaṃ jagmur ajihmagāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:572: 16,008.059c akṣayā hi purā bhūtvā kṣīṇāḥ kṣatajabhojanāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:576: 16,008.061c jagmur ādāya te mlecchāḥ samantāj janamejaya
GE07mbh_16_u:577: 16,008.062a dhanaṃjayas tu daivaṃ tan manasācintayat prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:581: 16,008.064a babhūva vimanāḥ pārtho daivam ity anucintayan
GE07mbh_16_u:582: 16,008.064c nyavartata tato rājan nedam astīti cābravīt
GE07mbh_16_u:583: 16,008.065a tataḥ sa śeṣam ādāya kalatrasya mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:591: 16,008.068a tato vṛddhāṃś ca bālāṃś ca striyaś cādāya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:592: 16,008.068c vīrair vihīnān sarvāṃs tāñ śakraprasthe nyaveśayat
GE07mbh_16_u:598: 16,008.071a rukmiṇī tv atha gāndhārī śaibyā haimavatīty api
GE07mbh_16_u:604: 16,008.073a dvārakāvāsino ye tu puruṣāḥ pārtham anvayuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:611: 16,009.002a sa tam āsādya dharmajñam upatasthe mahāvratam
GE07mbh_16_u:613: 16,009.003a svāgataṃ te 'stv iti prāha muniḥ satyavatīsutaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:618: 16,009.004d*0052_01 paricārakeṣu yaḥ kaś cit tiṣṭhann eva vinidritaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:620: 16,009.004d*0052_03 sarvopaniṣadām arthaṃ yo brūte sa mahāguruḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:624: 16,009.005a avīrajo 'bhighātas te brāhmaṇo vā hatas tvayā
GE07mbh_16_u:625: 16,009.005c yuddhe parājito vāsi gataśrīr iva lakṣyase
GE07mbh_16_u:626: 16,009.006a na tvā pratyabhijānāmi kim idaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_16_u:627: 16,009.006c śrotavyaṃ cen mayā pārtha kṣipram ākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_16_u:629: 16,009.006d*0053_01 tataḥ pārtho viniḥśvasya śrūyatāṃ bhagavan iti
GE07mbh_16_u:633: 16,009.007c sa kṛṣṇaḥ saha rāmeṇa tyaktvā dehaṃ divaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:634: 16,009.007d*0054_01 tad anusmṛtya saṃmohaṃ sadā śokaṃ mahāmate
GE07mbh_16_u:639: 16,009.007d*0055_02 yatprabhāveṇa nirdagdhāḥ sa kṛṣṇas tyaktavān bhuvam
GE07mbh_16_u:642: 16,009.009a ye te śūrā mahātmānaḥ siṃhadarpā mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:643: 16,009.009c bhojavṛṣṇyandhakā brahmann anyonyaṃ tair hataṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_16_u:645: 16,009.010c ta erakābhir nihatāḥ paśya kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_16_u:648: 16,009.012a punaḥ punar na mṛśyāmi vināśam amitaujasām
GE07mbh_16_u:649: 16,009.012c cintayāno yadūnāṃ ca kṛṣṇasya ca yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:651: 16,009.013c nabhasaḥ patanaṃ caiva śaityam agnes tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_16_u:653: 16,009.014c na ceha sthātum icchāmi loke kṛṣṇavinākṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:654: 16,009.015a itaḥ kaṣṭataraṃ cānyac chṛṇu tad vai tapodhana
GE07mbh_16_u:655: 16,009.015c mano me dīryate yena cintayānasya vai muhuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:656: 16,009.016a paśyato vṛṣṇidārāś ca mama brahman sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:658: 16,009.017a dhanur ādāya tatrāhaṃ nāśakaṃ tasya pūraṇe
GE07mbh_16_u:659: 16,009.017c yathā purā ca me vīryaṃ bhujayor na tathābhavat
GE07mbh_16_u:661: 16,009.018c śarāś ca kṣayam āpannāḥ kṣaṇenaiva samantataḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:662: 16,009.018d*0056_01 tad dhanus tāni cāstrāṇi sa rathas te ca vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:663: 16,009.018d*0056_02 sarvam ekapade bhraṣṭaṃ dānam aśrotriye yathā
GE07mbh_16_u:666: 16,009.020a yaḥ sa yāti purastān me rathasya sumahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:667: 16,009.020c pradahan ripusainyāni na paśyāmy aham adya tam
GE07mbh_16_u:670: 16,009.022a tam apaśyan viṣīdāmi ghūrṇāmīva ca sattama
GE07mbh_16_u:673: 16,009.023a vinā janārdanaṃ vīraṃ nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe
GE07mbh_16_u:674: 16,009.023c śrutvaiva hi gataṃ viṣṇuṃ mamāpi mumuhur diśaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:676: 16,009.024c upadeṣṭuṃ mama śreyo bhavān arhati sattama
GE07mbh_16_u:678: 16,009.025*0058_01 devāṃśā devadevena saṃbhūtās te gatāḥ saha
GE07mbh_16_u:681: 16,009.025c vinaṣṭāḥ kuruśārdūla na tāñ śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_16_u:682: 16,009.026a bhavitavyaṃ tathā tad dhi diṣṭam etan mahātmanām
GE07mbh_16_u:684: 16,009.027a trailokyam api kṛṣṇo hi kṛtsnaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07mbh_16_u:685: 16,009.027c prasahed anyathā kartuṃ kim u śāpaṃ manīṣiṇām
GE07mbh_16_u:686: 16,009.027d*0059_01 striyaś ca tāḥ purā śaptāḥ prahāsakupitena vai
GE07mbh_16_u:688: 16,009.028a rathasya purato yāti yaḥ sa cakragadādharaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:691: 16,009.029c mokṣayitvā jagat sarvaṃ gataḥ svasthānam uttamam
GE07mbh_16_u:692: 16,009.030a tvayā tv iha mahat karma devānāṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_16_u:694: 16,009.031a kṛtakṛtyāṃś ca vo manye saṃsiddhān kurupuṃgava
GE07mbh_16_u:695: 16,009.031c gamanaṃ prāptakālaṃ ca tad dhi śreyo mataṃ mama
GE07mbh_16_u:696: 16,009.032a balaṃ buddhiś ca tejaś ca pratipattiś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_16_u:699: 16,009.032d*0060_02 te mām arjuna kālotthakarmaṇābhibhavo na saḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:700: 16,009.032d*0060_03 tvayā yat kauravā dhvastā yadābhīrair bhavāñ jitaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:702: 16,009.033c kāla eva samādatte punar eva yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_16_u:703: 16,009.034a sa eva balavān bhūtvā punar bhavati durbalaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:704: 16,009.034c sa eveśaś ca bhūtveha parair ājñāpyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:706: 16,009.035c punar eṣyanti te hastaṃ yadā kālo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_16_u:707: 16,009.036a kālo gantuṃ gatiṃ mukhyāṃ bhavatām api bhārata
GE07mbh_16_u:708: 16,009.036c etac chreyo hi vo manye paramaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_16_u:711: 16,009.038a praviśya ca purīṃ vīraḥ samāsādya yudhiṣṭhiram
